title: Ep. - 367 - ATTORNEY JAY EDELSON ON GIRARDI CASE KENT WEED, CREATOR OF AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR AND HELL’S KITCHEN
description:
Attorney Jay Edelson from Edelson PC talks about the federal lawsuit he filed against Tom and Erika Girardi, and the Hulu documentary The Housewife and The Hustler. He is considered one of the nation’s leading plaintiff’s lawyers.

 

Kent Weed founded reality television powerhouse A. Smith & Co. Productions with Arthur Smith in 2000, and brings more than two decades of experience in unscripted formats to bear as an executive producer on all of the company's projects, including the Emmy nominated hit show Hell's Kitchen, as well as Kitchen Nightmares, American Ninja Warrior, I Survived a Japanese Game Show, Paradise Hotel, and Trading Spaces. 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
